address.name: Description
address.value: An IPv4, hostname, or IPv6 address for the Backend

auto_loadbalance.name: Description
auto_loadbalance.value: Should this Backend be load balanced

between_bytes_timeout.name: Description
between_bytes_timeout.value: How long to wait between bytes in milliseconds

connect_timeout.name: Description
connect_timeout.value: How long to wait for a timeout in milliseconds

error_threshold.name: Description
error_threshold.value: Number of errors to allow before the Backend is marked as down

first_byte_timeout.name: Description
first_byte_timeout.value: How long to wait for the first bytes in milliseconds

healthcheck.name: Description
healthcheck.value: The healthcheck name that should be used for this Backend

max_conn.name: Description
max_conn.value: Maximum number of connections for this Backend

port.name: Description
port.value: The port number Backend responds on. Default 80

request_condition.name: Description
request_condition.value: Name of a condition, which if met, will select this backend during a request.

shield.name: Description
shield.value: The POP of the shield designated to reduce inbound load.

ssl_cert_hostname.name: Description
ssl_cert_hostname.value: SSL certificate hostname for cert verification

ssl_check_cert.name: Description
ssl_check_cert.value: Be strict on checking SSL certs

ssl_sni_hostname.name: Description
ssl_sni_hostname.value: SSL certificate hostname for SNI verification

weight.name: Description
weight.value: The portion of traffic to send to a specific origins. Each origin receives weight/total of the traffic.

cache_condition.name: Description
cache_condition.value: Name of a condition to check if this Cache Setting applies

name.name: Description
name.value: A name to refer to this Cache Setting

stale_ttl.name: Description
stale_ttl.value: Max 'Time To Live' for stale (unreachable) objects.

ttl.name: Description
ttl.value: The 'Time To Live' for the object

priority.name: Description
priority.value: A number used to determine the order in which multiple conditions execute. Lower numbers execute first

statement.name: Description
statement.value: The statement used to determine if the condition is met

type.name: Description
type.value: Type of the condition, either `REQUEST`, `RESPONSE`, or `CACHE`

default_host.name: Description
default_host.value: The default hostname for the version

default_ttl.name: Description
default_ttl.value: The default Time-to-live (TTL) for the version

name.name: Description
name.value: The domain that this Service will respond to

bucket_name.name: Description
bucket_name.value: The name of the bucket in which to store the logs.

email.name: Description
email.value: The email address associated with the target GCS bucket on your account.

format.name: Description
format.value: Apache-style string or VCL variables to use for log formatting

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this logging setup

path.name: Description
path.value: Path to store the files. Must end with a trailing slash

period.name: Description
period.value: How frequently the logs should be transferred, in seconds (Default 3600)

response_condition.name: Description
response_condition.value: Name of a condition to apply this logging.

secret_key.name: Description
secret_key.value: The secret key associated with the target gcs bucket on your account.

cache_condition.name: Description
cache_condition.value: Name of a condition controlling when this gzip configuration applies.

content_types.name: Description
content_types.value: Content types to apply automatic gzip to

extensions.name: Description
extensions.value: File extensions to apply automatic gzip to. Do not include '.'

name.name: Description
name.value: A name to refer to this gzip condition

action.name: Description
action.value: One of set, append, delete, regex, or regex_repeat

cache_condition.name: Description
cache_condition.value: Optional name of a cache condition to apply.

ignore_if_set.name: Description
ignore_if_set.value: Don't add the header if it is already. (Only applies to 'set' action.). Default `false`

name.name: Description
name.value: A name to refer to this Header object

regex.name: Description
regex.value: Regular expression to use (Only applies to 'regex' and 'regex_repeat' actions.)

request_condition.name: Description
request_condition.value: Optional name of a request condition to apply.

response_condition.name: Description
response_condition.value: Optional name of a response condition to apply.

source.name: Description
source.value: Variable to be used as a source for the header content (Does not apply to 'delete' action.)

substitution.name: Description
substitution.value: Value to substitute in place of regular expression. (Only applies to 'regex' and 'regex_repeat'.)

type.name: Description
type.value: Type to manipulate: request, fetch, cache, response

check_interval.name: Description
check_interval.value: How often to run the healthcheck in milliseconds

expected_response.name: Description
expected_response.value: The status code expected from the host

http_version.name: Description
http_version.value: Whether to use version 1.0 or 1.1 HTTP

initial.name: Description
initial.value: When loading a config, the initial number of probes to be seen as OK

name.name: Description
name.value: A name to refer to this healthcheck

threshold.name: Description
threshold.value: How many healthchecks must succeed to be considered healthy

window.name: Description
window.value: The number of most recent healthcheck queries to keep for this healthcheck

address.name: Description
address.value: The address of the papertrail service

format.name: Description
format.value: Apache-style string or VCL variables to use for log formatting

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this logging setup

port.name: Description
port.value: The port of the papertrail service

response_condition.name: Description
response_condition.value: Name of a condition to apply this logging

action.name: Description
action.value: Allows you to terminate request handling and immediately perform an action

force_miss.name: Description
force_miss.value: Force a cache miss for the request

hash_keys.name: Description
hash_keys.value: Comma separated list of varnish request object fields that should be in the hash key

max_stale_age.name: Description
max_stale_age.value: How old an object is allowed to be, in seconds. Default `60`

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this Request Setting

request_condition.name: Description
request_condition.value: Name of a request condition to apply. If there is no condition this setting will always be applied.

timer_support.name: Description
timer_support.value: Injects the X-Timer info into the request

cache_condition.name: Description
cache_condition.value: Name of the condition checked after we have retrieved an object. If the condition passes then deliver this Request Object instead.

content.name: Description
content.value: The content to deliver for the response object

content_type.name: Description
content_type.value: The MIME type of the content

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this request object

request_condition.name: Description
request_condition.value: Name of the condition to be checked during the request phase to see if the object should be delivered

response.name: Description
response.value: The HTTP Response of the object

status.name: Description
status.value: The HTTP Status Code of the object

bucket_name.name: Description
bucket_name.value: S3 Bucket name to store logs in

format.name: Description
format.value: Apache-style string or VCL variables to use for log formatting

format_version.name: Description
format_version.value: The version of the custom logging format used for the configured endpoint. Can be either 1 or 2. (Default: 1)

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this logging setup

path.name: Description
path.value: Path to store the files. Must end with a trailing slash

period.name: Description
period.value: How frequently the logs should be transferred, in seconds (Default 3600)

response_condition.name: Description
response_condition.value: Name of a condition to apply this logging.

format.name: Description
format.value: Apache-style string or VCL variables to use for log formatting

format_version.name: Description
format_version.value: The version of the custom logging format used for the configured endpoint. Can be either 1 or 2. (Default: 1)

message_type.name: Description
message_type.value: How the message should be formatted.

name.name: Description
name.value: Unique name to refer to this logging setup

response_condition.name: Description
response_condition.value: Name of a condition to apply this logging.

content.name: Description
content.value: The contents of this VCL configuration

main.name: Description
main.value: Should this VCL configuration be the main configuration

name.name: Description
name.value: A name to refer to this VCL configuration
